general.gigTitle: be your full stack web developer in PHP laravel, HTML, CSS

sellerCard.oneLiner: Empowering people through innovative software solutions
sellerCard.description:
We're a team of passionate web developers and AI enthusiasts with 7+ years of experience. Our expertise spans HTML, CSS, PHP, Laravel, Vue js, and more – even AI and ChatGPT. Crafting engaging websites is our forte, catering to the distinct requirements of our clients.

Beyond the realms of code, we're driven by the art of user experience. We're not just developers; we're storytellers, creating digital experiences that leave an impact. Our motivation? Turning ideas into exceptional results. Let's chat about your project!

description.content:
Are you a startup looking for a custom website solution?


With over 7+ years of valuable industry experience and a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, I have the expertise to precisely fit your business needs. Quality is my top priority, I work closely with you to ensure that your website not only meets but exceeds your expectations, helping you achieve your business goals.


SERVICES I OFFER


  • AI-driven software development
  • SaaS applications
  • E-commerce web applications
  • Management softwares
  • Custom website development (frontend and backend)
  • Full Stack Website creation from scratch
  • Development in PHP Laravel, Vue js SPA
  • Frontend web development
  • Figma to html, XD to html conversion
  • Database architecture (MySQL, MongoDB, Redis)
  • DevOps - Server management (Azure, AWS, VPS/Linux, DO)
  • Deployments
  • Domain/Hosting Setup


YOU CAN EXPECT


  • Dedicated Support with Regular updates
  • Stress-free development experience
  • One month FREE post development support
  • Successful project delivery
  • 100% satisfaction guaranteed with fast and responsive communication


Innovative software solutions await! Schedule your free consultation now or browse the FAQ below.

slide.name: be your full stack web developer in PHP laravel, HTML, CSS

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide assistance in brainstorming ideas?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer a free consultation service to discuss your idea. During the consultation, I can provide you with my professional insights and recommendations to help you refine and develop your idea further.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I get a free consultation service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please feel free to reach out to me via message with your initial requirements document. After reviewing the document, I will respond to you promptly to discuss if I can assist you with your project. We can then schedule a call to further discuss your project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you guarantee product quality and reliability?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My top priority is ensuring the quality of the final product. I pay close attention to your requirements, carefully analyzing and understanding your needs and desires. This enables me to develop a profound understanding of your project, ultimately resulting in a final product of exceptional quality.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you able to create custom websites without WordPress, WIX or Shopify.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I have extensive experience in creating custom websites without relying on pre-built platforms like WordPress, WIX or Shopify. I specialize in custom website development with custom requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide regular updates on order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, once I start working on your order, I will keep you updated with the progress of it. This way I can achieve your satisfaction time by time and if any changes required I will fix that on the spot therefore, no misunderstandings can occur at the end of the final product.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide post-development support on long term basis?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! I provide post-development support to ensure that your website is functioning correctly and efficiently. I offer regular updates and maintenance to address any issues that may arise after the initial development phase. I am willing to build long term working relations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you guarantee 100% satisfaction?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Clear communication and collaboration are key to ensuring 100% satisfaction. I listen carefully to your needs and provide regular updates during development to ensure your requirements are met. If any issues arise, I will work with you until you are completely satisfied.

packageList.title: Personal/Portfolio Webpage.
packageList.description: A webpage with an opt-in form. Have custom requirements? Get FREE Consultation.

packageList.title: Database Driven Website.
packageList.description: Basic web application with database functionality. Custom requirements? Get FREE Consultation.

reviews.comment: I think everything has been said. If you would like to learn more about Nofil's exceptional work, please check out all of our previous reviews or send us a message so we can tell you personally. As always, we look forward to our continued collaboration. Thanks!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the kind words and continued support! We truly appreciate the trust and confidence you’ve placed in our work. Looking forward to many more successful collaborations ahead!

reviews.comment: Working with Nofil R. was an EXCELLENT experience! His attention to detail and professionalism in website development really shone through. He delivered on time and went above and beyond, all with a polite and friendly demeanor. 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the kind words! We truly appreciate the opportunity to work with you and bring your vision to life. Delivering quality work and ensuring your satisfaction is always our priority. Looking forward to future collaborations! 👍

reviews.comment: Nofil R. truly impressed with his exceptional professionalism and code expertise, delivering results that EXCEEDED expectations. Collaborating with him was a breeze thanks to his fantastic cooperation, prompt delivery, and fluency in communication. Highly recommend his services in website development! 👏

seller_response.comment: Thank you! 🙌 We truly appreciate your kind words and trust in our work. It was a pleasure collaborating with you, and we’re glad we could exceed expectations. Looking forward to more successful projects together!

reviews.comment: I love working with Nofil he is an amazing guy listen to details and cooperative works I will definitely complete working with him for all the next phases and developments for my projects

seller_response.comment: Thank you! 🙌 We truly appreciate your trust and kind words. It’s been a pleasure collaborating with you, and we’re excited to continue working together on the next phases of your projects!

reviews.comment: As always, it was a pleasure to work with Nofil and we look forward to our future collaboration. Thank you!

seller_response.comment: Thank you! It’s always a pleasure working with you as well. I appreciate the smooth collaboration and look forward to continuing our work together in the future!

reviews_snippet.comment: Nofil R. truly impressed with his exceptional professionalism and code expertise, delivering results that EXCEEDED expectations. Collaborating with him was a breeze thanks to his fantastic cooperation, prompt delivery, and fluency in communication. Highly recommend his services in website development! 👏

Nofil R. is an exceptional website developer! His work was incredibly professional, detailed, and he went above and beyond my expectations. Plus, his proactive communication and politeness made the collaboration smooth and enjoyable. 👍
I love working with Nofil he is an amazing guy listen to details and cooperative works I will definitely complete working with him for all the next phases and developments for my projects

We have been working with Nofil for several months now and have been consistently impressed by his expertise and availability. Change requests were implemented almost immediately and he always takes a lot of time in the video calls to answer all questions. His professional opinion on implementation details is always welcome and shows that he knows what he is talking about. 
We look forward to continuing our collaboration.

Nofil is a great professional and very good at what he does. He is also very fair across bug fixes, changes and scope creep. He has been a pleasure to work with again! It's a big project and he's also been very helpful on a wide range of tech related questions and topics and is always willing to discuss and strategise.
